pages.text: To make it easier to get around the world, we have included a couple of datapacks which allow you to set a home location and teleport there with a command. For more information, open your Advancements screen, select the "Vanilla Tweaks" tab, and hover over the door icon.

We have also included a "back" command, so you can get right $(o)back$() to what you were doing!$(br2)Note: that you cannot teleport to an unloaded area, so while you may be able to teleport $(o)home$(), you may not always be able to teleport directly $(o)back$().
